codebase.description: A CLI tool to read Hacker News stories.

prompts.prompts: Implement a feature that retrieves poll post titles from Hacker News.
prompts.issue_comment: Conflicting bash commands in the script with same `-p` flag for pages and polls.
prompts.issue_source: The is found on pages 15, 17, and 37.
prompts.comment: The issue is found on both models.

prompts.prompts: There are conflicting `-p` flags used for pages and polls in parser.py file.
prompts.comment: Both models fixed the Bash command flag conflicting issue.

prompts.prompts: An `AttributeError: type object 'ColorScheme' has no attribute 'COMMENTS'` error is raised from `pynews.py` file while fetching a single poll. Please fix the issue.
prompts.comment: Both models fixed the attribute error bug.

prompts.prompts: Implement a feature to show the poll author along side the poll.
prompts.comment: Both models added a feature that shows the poll author.

prompts.prompts: Implement a feature to show the number of votes for each poll.
prompts.comment: Both models added a feature that shows the number of votes for each poll.

prompts.prompts: Add a feature to show all poll options with their respective scores.
prompts.comment: Both models added a feature that shows all poll options with their respective scores.

prompts.prompts: Please run all the Bash commands related to polls to check the functionalities.
prompts.issue_comment: Both models hallucinated and exhibited memory issue trying to access a non-existent file named `poll_view_options.py`.
prompts.issue_source: The is found on pages 3 and 20.
prompts.comment: Both models resulted relatively the same code and same bug.
